geom_hdr_rug

Source: R/geom-hdr-rug.R
geom_hdr_rug.Rd

rug visualization for HDR plot

geom_hdr_rug(
  mapping = NULL,
  data = NULL,
  stat = "hdr",
  position = "identity",
  ...,
  na.rm = FALSE,
  show.legend = NA,
  inherit.aes = TRUE,
  sides = "bl",
  rug_width = unit(0.03, "npc"),
  prob = c(0.5, 0.95, 0.99)
)

Arguments

mapping

Default: NULL
data

data
stat

stat
position

Default: "identity"
...

...
na.rm

Default: FALSE
show.legend

Default: NA
inherit.aes

Default: TRUE
sides

position to put rugs
rug_width

width of rugs, Default: unit(0.03, "npc")
prob

PARAM_DESCRIPTION, Default: c(0.5, 0.95, 0.99)

Value

geom_hdr_rug

Examples

library(ggplot2)

ggplot(faithful, aes(x = waiting, y = eruptions)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_hdr_rug()
